author: Mho_23
text:
i just found the biggest opportunity to print with AI in 2025...

every business knows they need videos for ads and social media but production companies charge so much that most people can't afford it

you can just solve this problem by selling them AI videos from Sora 2 or Veo 3.1… this is the fastest way to go from $0 to $10k/month with AI and it’s stupidly easy

i put together the AI Content Agency Blueprint to get you started, here’s what you’re getting :
 - the 3-tier service menu that sells ai videos as premium solutions (not budget alternatives)
- the complete AI production workflow that delivers high quality videos
- how to be a revenue partner and make sure they actually see results with the videos

reply 'AGENCY' + RT and i'll send you everything (must follow so i can dm)
